SEARCH
Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.json.parsing

Class JsonParser

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.json.parsing.JsonParser
@Component public class JsonParser extends Object
JsonParser provides methods for working with JSON in a robust way. Uses the configured ObjectMapper to parse and convert JSON.

    • toJsonSafe

      public String toJsonSafe(Object object) throws ConfigurationException
      Directly uses the fallback serialization approach without trying standard serialization first. Useful when you know the object contains problematic fields or circular references.
      Throws:
      ConfigurationException

    • toPrettyJsonSafe
